remarks: The restriction of a function to an unbounded-above interval is eventually bounded iff the original is eventually bounded.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2016.)
statement:
rlimresb.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
rlimresb.2 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
rlimresb.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
o1resb $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. O(1) <-> ( F |` ( B [,) +oo ) ) e. O(1) ) ) $.
